verses.verse: Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, The heaven <S%H8064><s%> is my throne <S%H3678><s%>, and the earth <S%H776><s%> is my footstool <S%H7272><s%> <S%H1916><s%>: where is the house <S%H1004><s%> that ye build <S%H1129><s%> unto me? and where is the place <S%H4725><s%> of my rest <S%H4496><s%>?

For all those things hath mine hand <S%H3027><s%> made <S%H6213><s%>, and all those things have been, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: but to this man will I look <S%H5027><s%>, even to him that is poor <S%H6041><s%> and of a contrite <S%H5223><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%>, and trembleth <S%H2730><s%> at my word <S%H1697><s%>.

He that killeth <S%H7819><s%> an ox <S%H7794><s%> is as if he slew <S%H5221><s%> a man <S%H376><s%>; he that sacrificeth <S%H2076><s%> a lamb <S%H7716><s%>, as if he cut off <S%H6202><s%> a dog's <S%H3611><s%> neck <S%H6202><s%>; he that offereth <S%H5927><s%> an oblation <S%H4503><s%>, as if he offered swine's <S%H2386><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%>; he that burneth <S%H2142><s%> incense <S%H3828><s%>, as if he blessed <S%H1288><s%> an idol <S%H205><s%>. Yea, they have chosen <S%H977><s%> their own ways <S%H1870><s%>, and their soul <S%H5315><s%> delighteth <S%H2654><s%> in their abominations <S%H8251><s%>.

I also will choose <S%H977><s%> their delusions <S%H8586><s%>, and will bring <S%H935><s%> their fears <S%H4035><s%> upon them; because when I called <S%H7121><s%>, none did answer <S%H6030><s%>; when I spake <S%H1696><s%>, they did not hear <S%H8085><s%>: but they did <S%H6213><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> before mine eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and chose <S%H977><s%> that in which I delighted <S%H2654><s%> not.

Â¶ Hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, ye that tremble <S%H2730><s%> at his word <S%H1697><s%>; Your brethren <S%H251><s%> that hated <S%H8130><s%> you, that cast you out <S%H5077><s%> for my name's <S%H8034><s%> sake, said <S%H559><s%>, Let the LORD <S%H3068><s%> be glorified <S%H3513><s%>: but he shall appear <S%H7200><s%> to your joy <S%H8057><s%>, and they shall be ashamed <S%H954><s%>.

A voice <S%H6963><s%> of noise <S%H7588><s%> from the city <S%H5892><s%>, a voice <S%H6963><s%> from the temple <S%H1964><s%>, a voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> that rendereth <S%H7999><s%> recompence <S%H1576><s%> to his enemies <S%H341><s%>.
Before she travailed <S%H2342><s%>, she brought forth <S%H3205><s%>; before her pain <S%H2256><s%> came <S%H935><s%>, she was delivered <S%H4422><s%> of a man child <S%H2145><s%>.

Who hath heard <S%H8085><s%> such a thing? who hath seen <S%H7200><s%> such things? Shall the earth <S%H776><s%> be made to bring forth <S%H2342><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>? or shall a nation <S%H1471><s%> be born <S%H3205><s%> at once <S%H6471><s%>? for as soon as <S%H1571><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%> travailed <S%H2342><s%>, she brought forth <S%H3205><s%> her children <S%H1121><s%>.

Shall I bring to the birth <S%H7665><s%>, and not cause to bring forth <S%H3205><s%>? saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: shall I <S%H589><s%> cause to bring forth <S%H3205><s%>, and shut <S%H6113><s%> the womb? saith <S%H559><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>.

Rejoice <S%H8055><s%> ye with Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, and be glad <S%H1523><s%> with her, all ye that love <S%H157><s%> her: rejoice <S%H7797><s%> for joy <S%H4885><s%> with her, all ye that mourn <S%H56><s%> for her:

That ye may suck <S%H3243><s%>, and be satisfied <S%H7646><s%> with the breasts <S%H7699><s%> of her consolations <S%H8575><s%>; that ye may milk out <S%H4711><s%>, and be delighted <S%H6026><s%> with the abundance <S%H2123><s%> of her glory <S%H3519><s%>.

For thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, Behold, I will extend <S%H5186><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> to her like a river <S%H5104><s%>, and the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the Gentiles <S%H1471><s%> like a flowing <S%H7857><s%> stream <S%H5158><s%>: then shall ye suck <S%H3243><s%>, ye shall be borne <S%H5375><s%> upon her sides <S%H6654><s%>, and be dandled <S%H8173><s%> upon her knees <S%H1290><s%>.
As one <S%H376><s%> whom his mother <S%H517><s%> comforteth <S%H5162><s%>, so will I comfort <S%H5162><s%> you; and ye shall be comforted <S%H5162><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.

And when ye see <S%H7200><s%> this, your heart <S%H3820><s%> shall rejoice <S%H7797><s%>, and your bones <S%H6106><s%> shall flourish <S%H6524><s%> like an herb <S%H1877><s%>: and the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall be known <S%H3045><s%> toward his servants <S%H5650><s%>, and his indignation <S%H2194><s%> toward his enemies <S%H341><s%>.

For, behold, the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will come <S%H935><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>, and with his chariots <S%H4818><s%> like a whirlwind <S%H5492><s%>, to render <S%H7725><s%> his anger <S%H639><s%> with fury <S%H2534><s%>, and his rebuke <S%H1606><s%> with flames <S%H3851><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%>.

For by fire <S%H784><s%> and by his sword <S%H2719><s%> will the LORD <S%H3068><s%> plead <S%H8199><s%> with all flesh <S%H1320><s%>: and the slain <S%H2491><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall be many <S%H7231><s%>.

They that sanctify <S%H6942><s%> themselves, and purify <S%H2891><s%> themselves in the gardens <S%H1593><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> one <S%H259><s%> tree in the midst <S%H8432><s%>, eating <S%H398><s%> swine's <S%H2386><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%>, and the abomination <S%H8263><s%>, and the mouse <S%H5909><s%>, shall be consumed <S%H5486><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

For I know their works <S%H4639><s%> and their thoughts <S%H4284><s%>: it shall come <S%H935><s%>, that I will gather <S%H6908><s%> all nations <S%H1471><s%> and tongues <S%H3956><s%>; and they shall come <S%H935><s%>, and see <S%H7200><s%> my glory <S%H3519><s%>.

And I will set <S%H7760><s%> a sign <S%H226><s%> among them, and I will send <S%H7971><s%> those that escape <S%H6412><s%> of them unto the nations <S%H1471><s%>, to Tarshish <S%H8659><s%>, Pul <S%H6322><s%>, and Lud <S%H3865><s%>, that draw <S%H4900><s%> the bow <S%H7198><s%>, to Tubal <S%H8422><s%>, and Javan <S%H3120><s%>, to the isles <S%H339><s%> afar off <S%H7350><s%>, that have not heard <S%H8085><s%> my fame <S%H8088><s%>, neither have seen <S%H7200><s%> my glory <S%H3519><s%>; and they shall declare <S%H5046><s%> my glory <S%H3519><s%> among the Gentiles <S%H1471><s%>.

And they shall bring <S%H935><s%> all your brethren <S%H251><s%> for an offering <S%H4503><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> out of all nations <S%H1471><s%> upon horses <S%H5483><s%>, and in chariots <S%H7393><s%>, and in litters <S%H6632><s%>, and upon mules <S%H6505><s%>, and upon swift beasts <S%H3753><s%>, to my holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, as the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> bring <S%H935><s%> an offering <S%H4503><s%> in a clean <S%H2889><s%> vessel <S%H3627><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.
And I will also take <S%H3947><s%> of them for priests <S%H3548><s%> and for Levites <S%H3881><s%>, saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

For as the new <S%H2319><s%> heavens <S%H8064><s%> and the new <S%H2319><s%> earth <S%H776><s%>, which I will make <S%H6213><s%>, shall remain <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, so shall your seed <S%H2233><s%> and your name <S%H8034><s%> remain <S%H5975><s%>.

And it shall come to pass, that from <S%H1767><s%> one new moon <S%H2320><s%> to another <S%H2320><s%>, and from <S%H1767><s%> one sabbath <S%H7676><s%> to another <S%H7676><s%>, shall all flesh <S%H1320><s%> come <S%H935><s%> to worship <S%H7812><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me, saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

And they shall go forth <S%H3318><s%>, and look <S%H7200><s%> upon the carcases <S%H6297><s%> of the men <S%H582><s%> that have transgressed <S%H6586><s%> against me: for their worm <S%H8438><s%> shall not die <S%H4191><s%>, neither shall their fire <S%H784><s%> be quenched <S%H3518><s%>; and they shall be an abhorring <S%H1860><s%> unto all flesh <S%H1320><s%>.
